    • Method Detail

      • checkConsistency

        public static void checkConsistency()
                             throws MaryConfigurationException
        This method will try to check that the available configs are consistent and will spot obvious reasons why they might not work together as a full system. Reasons that are detected include:
        • There is no main config;
        • There is a voice with a certain locale but no language component has that locale.
        This method will return allright if everything is OK; if there is a problem, it will throw an Exception with a message indicating the problem.
        Throws:
        MaryConfigurationException - if the configuration cannot work as it is now.

      • getAllophoneSet

        public static AllophoneSet getAllophoneSet(Locale locale)
                                    throws MaryConfigurationException
        Get the allophone set for the given locale, or null if it cannot be retrieved.
        Parameters:
        locale -
        Returns:
        the allophone set for the given locale, or null of the locale is not supported.
        Throws:
        MaryConfigurationException - if the locale is supported in principle but no allophone set can be retrieved.

      • getPropertiesAccessor

        public PropertiesAccessor getPropertiesAccessor(boolean systemPropertiesOverride)
        Convenience access to this config's properties.
        Parameters:
        systemPropertiesOverride - whether to use system properties in priority if they exist. If true, any property requested from this properties accessor will first be looked up in the system properties, and only if it is not defined there, it will be looked up in this config's properties.
        Returns:

      • getProperty

        public String getProperty(String property,
                 String defaultValue)
        Get the given property. If it is not defined, the defaultValue is returned.
        Parameters:
        property - name of the property to retrieve
        defaultValue - value to return if the property is not defined.
        Returns:

      • getList

        public List<String> getList(String propertyName)
        For the given property name, return the value of that property as a list of items (interpreting the property value as a space-separated list).
        Parameters:
        propertyName -
        Returns:
        the list of items, or an empty list if the property is not defined or contains no items
